title: Token
description: A capability token that an agent is authorized to access a service method.

service.description: Feathers service corresponding to the token

method.description: Feathers method corresponding to the service

params.description: Params object with extra information corresponding to the token

jwt.description: JSON Web Token, a string that contains tokenId encrypted for use in browser

createdAt.description: Timestamp for when token was created, used to check expiration
